description.message: Adds URN support to the browser.

config.isbn.resolve_mode.caption.message: Redirection target for ISBN (International Standard Book Number) URNs

config.isbn.resolver.format.message: %isbn% = ISBN without hyphenations, %isbn10% = ISBN without hyphenations (10 digits), %isbn_raw% = raw ISBN, %urn% = raw URN, %urn_escaped% = escaped raw URN

config.nbn.resolver.message: Redirection target for NBN (National Bibliography Number) URNs

config.nbn.resolver.format.message: %nbn% = NBN part of URN, %urn% = raw URN, %urn_escaped% = escaped raw URN

config.oid.resolver.message: Redirection target for OID (Object Identifier) URNs

config.oid.resolver.format.message: %oid% = OID part of URN, %urn% = raw URN, %urn_escaped% = escaped raw URN

config.xmpp.resolver.message: Redirection target for XMPP Namespace URNs

config.xmpp.resolver.format.message: %protocol% = protocol part of URN, %urn% = raw URN, %urn_escaped% = escaped raw URN
